DOC.criteria: Have knee joint disease relate one follow osteoarthritis posttraumatic arthritis inflammatory tissue disorder arthritis secondary disease Avascular necrosis femoral condyle ; Skeletal maturity Less 70 Knee Society Score ( rating score ) Sufficient bone stock , judge radiograph , support primary knee implant Sufficient collateral ligament support device , judge physician stability test ( varus/valgus flexion/extension ) less 45 degree varus/valgus deformity and/or 90 degree flexion contracture Patient likely available evaluation duration study Able willing sign inform consent follow study procedure Patient pregnant No infection present No known material sensitivity Skeletal immaturity Greater equal 70 preoperative Knee Society Score ( Rating Score ) Postpatellectomy Insufficient bone quality may affect implant stability Insufficient collateral ligament , judge physician .
